thread.title: OFF-WHITE & Nike Might Be Working On Another Sneaker Collaboration

author: Daniel Pearson
title: OFF-WHITE & Nike Might Be Working On Another Sneaker Collaboration
text:
Rumors of an OFF-WHITE x Nike collaboration have been circulating for almost two years, but we‚Äôre still yet to see any official images. OFF-WHITE founder Virgil Abloh denied it was happening back in March, 2015, but recent clues and leaks suggest otherwise.
@Four_Pins false. Please fact check in the future.
‚Äî virgil abloh (@virgilabloh) March 27, 2015 

First, back in November, 2016, it was this leaked image of a black Air Force 1 . Now, Instagram user illroots has posted an image that appears to show a sample of a predominantly white Blazer Mid. Much like the AF1 seen at the end of last year, the mid-top silhouette also features recognizable ‚ÄúOff-White‚Ñ¢ c/o Nike‚Äù along the upper, partially covered by the Swoosh.
off-white nike blazer üëÄüëÄüëÄ 
A photo posted by ÷Ü»∂…® ü ü (@illroots) on Feb 6, 2017 at 5:49pm PST 

The thought of not one, but two, OFF-WHITE x Nike sneakers dropping sometime this year is sure to spark both excitement and panic in sneakerheads everywhere. Stay tuned for more information as we have it.
In other sneaker news, Jordan Brand celebrates NBA All-Star weekend with a new collection .
